abstract: As Pfizer sails toward its merger with Wyeth, it is hitting headwinds from patent expirations and weakening in sales in some key products, including Lipitor.
snippet: As Pfizer sails toward its merger with Wyeth, it is hitting headwinds from patent expirations and weakening in sales in some key products, including Lipitor.
lead_paragraph: As the drug giant Pfizer sails toward its merger with Wyeth, the company is hitting headwinds in the form of patent expirations and weakening sales in some important products, including Lipitor.

headline.main: Pfizer Profit Dips on Ease in Demand for Lipitor
headline.print_headline: Pfizer Profit Dips 2% as Demand for Lipitor Declines
